Title: Rushing towards the wide world
Designer: Zhang Bin (张彬)Chen Dongxue (陈东学)Shenyang Municipal Tiexi District Propaganda Station (沈阳市铁西区宣传站)
Publisher: Liaoning renmin chubanshe (辽宁人民出版社)
Notes: A group of sent-down youth standing in the doorway of a railroad carriage.
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
